content: write a plan for an eight-episode single season of tv called The Gig. The Gig takes place in a fictional historic music club in the French Quarter of New Orleans. the main characters are the stage manager, sound guy, lighting guy, and stage hands. Each episode is another day in the life of this crew which means a new band and road crew are at the club. There's a ton of sex, drugs, and rock and roll. The main story arc is of the club's aging owner who is being wooed by a big corporation who wants to buy him out.
